prefs-gravatar: Title of the avatar tab in [[Special:Preferences]].
prefs-gravatar-avatar-label: Label for the preview of the users current avatar.
prefs-gravatar-use-gravatar-label: Label for the checkbox that enables the Gravatar avatar.
prefs-gravatar-use-gravatar-help:
Help text for the checkbox that enables the Gravatar avatar.

* $1 - Link to the privacy policy of the Gravatar service.
